metadata.creator: Mario Allende
metadata.description: America Rosa; an Edmonton based group that fuses traditional Latin music with modern day sounds is featured. We are introduced to Sergio; the founder of the band, and his group before they give us a performance which demonstrates their diverse repertoire of music.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Nosotros #16
metadata.subject: America Rosa band; Music; Latin; Salsa; Merengue; Cumbia; Edmonton
